|Title=Know how to correct chronic metabolic acidosis
|Description=Know how to prescribe alkalinisation in the context of chronic kidney disease.
|Rubric=Management
|Contributors=P Rieu; B Moulin; M Flamant
|Order=8}}


*Treatment is necessary to prevent muscle wasting, bone demineralisation and, in children, stunted growth.
*Maintain plasma bicarbonate levels > 22 mmol/L by taking sodium bicarbonate orally (1 to 6 capsules a day, for example in cases of chronic renal failure).

question.title: What is the primary goal of treatment in chronic metabolic acidosis?

option_b.title: Prescribe alkalinisation to increase plasma bicarbonate levels

option_d.title: Prescribe potassium supplements to increase plasma bicarbonate levels

correct_option.title: Maintain plasma bicarbonate levels > 22 mmol/L
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
